name: Kantelemania
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2023.

Kantelemania takes you back to the roots of Finnish folklore. Väinämöinen, the uncontested main character of the Finnish national epic Kalevala, rests his weary legs on a stump and takes out his kantele to play a few notes. Much to his surprise, he garners quite the crowd. In Kantelemania, you help Väinämöinen play the kantele to keep his audience hyped up. Miss too many notes and Väinämöinen will face public humiliation. Let's not let it get to that.
